original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields steady at close, rupee at 321.50/90 against the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields closed steady on Tuesday and the rupee closed unchanged at 321.50/90 against the US dollar, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed at 28.00/30 percent, unchanged Monday’s close.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 26.50/70 percent, slightly down from 27.00/10 percent yesterday. (Colombo/April25/2023)
